channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Kroger and Albertsons head to court to defend merger plan against US regulators’ objections
item.description: Kroger and Albertsons will defend their plan to merge in a hearing scheduled to begin Monday in federal court in Oregon.

item.title: Utah judge to decide if author of children’s book on grief will face trial in her husband’s death
item.description: An evidentiary hearing is set for a Utah woman who wrote a children’s book about coping with grief after her husband’s death and was later accused of fatally poisoning him.

item.title: Closings set in trial of ex-politician accused of killing Las Vegas investigative reporter
item.description: Closing arguments are set in the trial of a former Democratic politician accused of killing a veteran Las Vegas investigative reporter almost two years ago.
